column4: WHy does ubuntu feeel MUCH slower on my laptop than PCLinuxOS???? i mean it takes me 3 minutes just to boot up ubuntu... HELP
i am using 7.10 it is slow and boots up in 3 minutes.. i have 1 GIG of ram and a celeron 2.4 GHz
really? i was having the same problem, but only with 7.04. the network setting took about 2 minutes
but with 7.10 everything is very fast
yeah ... it seems that Pc linux Os is aoo much faster ... especially with the 3D and beryl .. compiz effects
